summary.Title: Finance Planning Analyst, Copenhagen, Denmark
summary.Presentation: Do you want to influence reporting and decision making in one of Denmark’s fastest growing (and EQT backed) MedTech companies? Would you like to apply and develop your strong Finance skills by taki

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to influence reporting and decision making in one of Denmark’s fastest growing (and EQT backed) MedTech companies? Would you like to apply and develop your strong Finance skills by taking key responsibility in resource allocation, reporting to management and Board of Directors and finance partnering to select 3Shape areas? Do you want to be part of an international environment where teamwork, flexibility and people development shape our success? Then join 3Shape’s Finance Planning & Partnering team as a Finance Planning analyst.

About the position

You will be part of the Finance Partnering and Planning team anchored within the CFO area and join a team of 6 engaged colleagues. The CFO area is characterized by a dynamic and international working environment with constant focus on driving impact for 3Shape and developing our employees.

Your continued development is key to 3Shape’s success and ensured by regular feedback and development dialogues.

Key responsibilities include

  • Design and execute our budget and forecast processes with clear communication to the organization
  • Drive the entire organization during budget and forecasts and
  • Create Monthly Financial Reporting to Management, Board of Directors as well as EQT
  • Act as a finance partner to VP of People and Organization as well as to the CFO including support with forecasting, resource allocation processes, business cases and cost follow up
  • Ad hoc tasks driven by own manager as well as CFO

Qualifications

  • Relevant master’s degree from a business school, university (economics) or similar
  • 0-2 years of experience from a mid-large sized company
  • Good team player with willingness to go down into details while keeping the high-level perspective
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Excel wizard. Experience with PowerPoint and PowerBI is a plus
  • Curious, data driven and enjoy working with structuring, analyzing, and presenting data in an easily understandable manner to senior decision makers
  • Unquestionable values, and care for people.

What do we offer:

  • Employee flexibility to ensure balance with your priorities and life
  • Young and dynamic environment in a fast-paced company
  • Attractive offices in the center of Copenhagen, next to metro station
  • Healthcare package to keep you fit and well.
  • Lunch cooked by our private chef.
  • Focus on your development by ongoing feedback and development dialogues
  • A fun place to work, where we have weekly fun sessions, quarterly team events and company wide Friday bars and social clubs

For questions, please reach out to Robert Jørgensen,  Robert.Jorgensen@3shape.com

See the vacancy here and apply online:

https://careers.3shape.com/jobs/1566246-finance-planning-analyst

Applications are reviewed on an ongoing basis.

We encourage all relevant applicants to apply. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, age, disability, or any other status. All qualified applicants will be given equal opportunity and the selection is based on job-related factors.

 

About 3Shape

3Shape started with a simple idea - to make 3D scanning better. First, we applied it to the hearing industry, then we succeeded in dentistry. Now, twenty years later, 3Shape is 1,900+ employees globally and backed by EQT. With the help of dental professionals and amazing colleagues, we are creating award-winning scanning and CAD/CAM solutions to change dentistry together! Together, we contribute to a better world. Experience the everyday #lifeat3Shape across the globe on Facebook.

https://www.3shape.com/
